events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is not what I ordered and I am quite disappointed.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting money back for the incorrect product.
Your case has been assigned to one of our refund specialists who will assist you shortly with the process to get your money back.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I am here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the error and process your refund faster?
Here is my order number 123456 and I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is not the one I ordered.
Thank you for providing the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the wrong item.
Thank you for your prompt response and the easy refund process. I appreciate that I don't have to return the item.
Your refund has been successfully initiated. You should see the amount credited back within 5 business days. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
As we have not heard back from you, we will now proceed to close this case. Thank you for choosing our service and have a great day!
